column4: my macbook resolution changed to 1024x768, after playing with the "system >> preferences >> resolution" tool. Now I cant get it back to the nice resolution it was before I installed. Tried the dpk-reconfigure command but that is not working either. Can someone please asisst? (8.04)
try System > Administration > Screens and Graphics
I havent seen that option in Hardy, it was available in Gutsy though
oh opps they removed it in Hardy .. damn
